sections.heading: services, defined.Valuation services means services pertaining to an aspect of property value, including a service performed by real property appraisers

sections.text:
76-2219.01.Valuation services, defined.

Valuation services means services pertaining to an aspect of property value, including a service performed by real property appraisers.

SourceLaws 2015, LB139, § 38;Laws 2018, LB741, § 25;Laws 2020, LB808, § 67.
